On this page
Table of Contents for current page

BorderBox #

BorderBox组件。

BorderBox1 #

js
<border-box1>
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box1>

<border-box1>
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box1>

BorderBox2 #

TIP

borderBox2因为有外边框的距离，所以他的width和height取决于他的父容器，而不是子节点。

js
<div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;">
  <border-box2 />
</div>

<div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;">
  <border-box2 />
</div>

BorderBox3 #

js
<border-box3>
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box3>

<border-box3>
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box3>

BorderBox4 #

js
<border-box4 title="title" :titleWidth="250">
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box4>

<border-box4 title="title" :titleWidth="250">
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box4>

BorderBox4.API #

属性说明类型默认值版本
title边框标题string''
title-width标题宽度number250

BorderBox5 #

js
<border-box5>
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box5>

<border-box5>
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box5>

js
<border-box6 >
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box6>

<border-box6 >
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box6>

BorderBox7 #

js
<border-box7 >
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box7>

<border-box7 >
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box7>

BorderBox8 #

js
<border-box8 >
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box8>

<border-box8 >
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box8>

BorderBox8.API #

属性说明类型默认值版本
reverse动画方向，默认顺时针booleanfalse
duration动画时间(s)number3

BorderBox9 #

js
<border-box9 >
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box9>

<border-box9 >
  <div style="height: 200px;width: 100%;"></div>
</border-box9>
